reviews.review_msg: there should be 2 chilis next to her name..HOT! hehehe seriously, cathi's not only a great prof but a great person too. super helpful and understanding. take her class, you wont regret it!plus, she doesnt believe in tests!
really good prof, makes 2 hours seem like 20 minutes. cool, hip and "young-ish".

It's a morning class.  Otherwise, this is the most relaxing, challenging, and fun class I've taken so far!  You'll never find a more caring, responsive, or wonderful teacher than Meg Zuccaro.  She brings out the best in her students.
